sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Post(props) { let history=useHistory(); useEffect(() => { if(!localStorage.getItem('Token')) { history.push('./login') } getData() }, []) const getData=()=>axios({method: 'post',url:'http://localhost:5000/getPost'}).then(result=>{ props.setresultAllPost(result.data); }); /// code for likes const handleLikeUnlike=(postId,field)=>{ axios({ method:'Post', url:`http://localhost:5000/${field}`, data:{postId,field} }).then(result=>{ props.setresultAllPost(result.data) }) } return ( <> { ((props.resultAllPost).length!==0)?props.resultAllPost.map(val=>
{val.title}
{val.category}
{ val.userId }
{val.date} {val.time}
  • Share
  • Flag
  • 4 Comments
  • handleLikeUnlike(val._id,'like')} > Likes
    • {val.like}
  • handleLikeUnlike(val._id,'unlike')}> Unlike
    • {val.unlike}
) :'' } ) } export default Post
